nodes.text: Coromon headhunters were predatory canine creatures native to the Coromon Islands on the planet Fresia. Its fearsome name derived from its ghoulish—but naturally evolved—method of hunting. The headhunter used its powerful double dew claws on its forelegs to decapitate its prey, then ate every part of its kill, bones, hair and all, except for the skull, which it then kept in its den. A typical headhunter lair was stacked with dozens or even hundreds of skulls piled along the walls.
Incom Corporation's main headquarters and production facilities were located on Fresia, and their Z-95 Headhunter was named after this creature.
